# allowsImageOutput

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value specifying whether the renderer can create output images.

## Declaration

```swift
var allowsImageOutput: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], this renderer can be used to generate [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGImage] objects.

## Configuring the renderer

- **format**: The format used to create the graphics renderer.

items.description: The format used to create the graphics renderer.
